title: the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated to Hildegarde Naughton,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Children, Disability and Equality
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Children, Disability and Equality 

(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited child disability equality (delegation ministerial functions) order 2025

title: the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated to Hildegarde Naughton,
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for Children, Disability and Equality conferred on her by or under 
the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated to Hildegarde Naughton, 
Minister of State at the Department of Children, Disability and Equality. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [360] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister child disability equality conferred enactment specified schedule delegated hildegarde naughton minister state department child disability equality notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 15th july 2025 360 3

title: the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated to Hildegarde Naughton,
heading: National Disability Authority Act 1999 (No. 14 of 1999)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

National Disability Authority Act 1999 (No. 14 of 1999) 

Disability Act 2005 (No. 14 of 2005), other than sections 31 and 32A 

Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) Act 2015 (No. 64 of 2015) 

Irish Sign Language Act 2017 (No. 40 of 2017) 

Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 46 of 2022) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

8 July, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [360]
